QuestData.Title: Where Is My Warfleet?
QuestData.Description:
The Highlands are the home of the Dragonmaw orcs. If we show them our might they would ally with us against the Twilight's Hammer. I am certain!
The fleet is gathering at Bilgewater Port in Azshara but there are reports of delays. You did good getting the goblins to work, I need your skills here too. Find Warlord Krogg in Azshara and see what is taking so long.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Warlord Krogg at Bilgewater Port in Azshara.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Warlord Krogg at Bilgewater Port in Azshara.
QuestData.RewardText: What, a message from Saurfang? Bah, I knew if these delays kept piling up we'd eventually have his attention on us.$B$BHave you ever worked with goblins before? Everywhere is another hidden cost. Our ships lie half-assembled and the air fleet is scattered to the winds.$B$BIf this invasion is going to happen, I'm going to need your help.
